title: enter contact info
fields: <input type='email' placeholder = 'Enter mail' class='name_field' data-target='.my_mail'> <input type='text' placeholder = 'Enter linkedin' data-target='.my_linkedin' class='name_field'> <input type='tel' placeholder = 'Enter phone' data-target='.my_phone' class='name_field'> <input type='text' placeholder = 'Enter website' data-target='.my_website' class='name_field'>

title: enter experience
fields: <input type='text' placeholder='company' data-target='.jobt' class='name_field'> <input type='text' placeholder='job' class='name_field' data-target='.company'> <input type='text' placeholder='2001 to present' data-target='.ftf' class='name_field'>

title: enter education
fields: <input type='text' class='name_field' data-target= '.institute_name' placeholder='Institute Name'> <input type='text' placeholder='course name' class='name_field' data-target='.course_name'> <input type='text' placeholder='date' class='name_field' data-target='.course_date'>
